channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
I have a 508 server but i get loads of lag can i reduce it by a bit somehow?
2)How do i edit characters stats because the mainfile save bit ant working i did know how to make a command called ::stats which could do it in commands.java but i forgot how to make commands now because i ant been on for a few months!
Please help
Thanks!

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Andy89898, post:1, topic:252279”]I have a 508 server but i get loads of lag can i reduce it by a bit somehow?

2)How do i edit characters stats because the mainfile save bit ant working i did know how to make a command called ::stats which could do it in commands.java but i forgot how to make commands now because i ant been on for a few months!

Please help

Thanks![/quote]

To reduce lag.

In player.java, in the processing method (public void process), add this:

System.gc();

Read full topic
